pr_title: NXP-28918: add a 'nx:arrayContains' function in the EL context

timeline.bodyText:
For consistency:
Returns {@code true} if the given {@code arr} contains the given {@code o}.
or
Returns {@code true} if the given array contains the given object.

timeline.bodyText: Please also test the null case.

replies.bodyText: WDYM? The array to null or the element? (or both maybe?)
replies.author: troger

replies.bodyText:
First test is testing  a null (non-existent) array in the context.
I can't explicitly set a null value with evaluatorUnderTest#bindValue anyway.
replies.author: troger

timeline.bodyText: While we're at it wouldn't it be useful to also code now an arrayContainsAll and arrayContainsAny? And maybe arrayContainsNone?
